Card 3.name: Personal Website
Card 3.p1: Showcases my projects, resume, and github all condensed in an aesthetic and fun layout. (p.s. you are here!)

Card 2.name: Music Player
Card 2.p1: Builds upon Java's Clip class, providing playlists, albums, and a structured library for the user through a simple command line interface. Use youtube-dl to download audio files from youtube, or place your own wav files into the /music directory.

Card 1.name: Sakura Sushi & Grill
Card 1.p1: Responsive online menu designed to facilitate placing pickup orders and displaying relevant information for the family restaurant. Angular frontend hosted on GitHub Pages and .NET backend hosted on Azure.
Card 1.p2: Github repo for frontend: https://github.com/njyeung/Sakura-Repo, live website: https://eatsakura.com, backend: undisclosed
